pages.text: The Fargo's Dungeon only generates between Y:-40 and Y:20. It is an underground structure that spawns in any biome in the Nether. Each dungeon should be spaced between 16-24 chucks apart.

This structure only does 6 steps, but falls back on a 7th step for decoration. Sometimes you may get a bad roll on generation and it may be a small dungeon. It's designed to be randomly generated to hopefully provide a comprehensive dungeon design. Suggestions are welcome in Github for additional rooms or hallway designs.
